item.title: Trump's toppling of Maduro is fraught with risk - what happens next is unclear
item.description: Will the US push for elections or will it try to depose more members of the government, asks the BBC's Ione Wells.

item.title: What we know about Maduro's capture
item.description: Maduro and his wife were taken from "a house that was more like a fortress", Donald Trump says.

item.title: Why has Trump attacked Venezuela and taken Maduro?
item.description: The US has been ramping up pressure on the Venezuelan leader since Trump took office last January.

item.title: Trump on Venezuela: 'We are going to run the country'
item.description: President Donald Trump announced that the US will run Venezuela until a 'proper transition can take place.'

item.title: BBC reaches agreement with Israeli family for filming in home after 7 October without consent
item.description: The family who survived the Hamas attack in 2023 call the incident an “intrusion”.
